snippet: Notorious for flubbing acquisitions, Yahoo has bought six small companies under Marissa Mayer in an attempt to cultivate innovative engineers and technologies.
abstract: Yahoo chief Marissa Mayer has undertaken flurry of start-up acquisitions as part of her turnaround effort at company, which is in dire need of innovative engineers and technologies; Mayer faces stiff competition in deep-pocketed rivals like Google, Facebook and Twitter.

byline.original: By JENNA WORTHAM and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: Notorious for flubbing acquisitions, Yahoo has bought six small companies under Marissa Mayer in an attempt to cultivate innovative engineers and technologies.

headline.main: Chief Tries to Infuse Yahoo With a Start-Up’s Spirit
headline.print_headline: Chief Tries to Infuse Yahoo With a Start-Up’s Spirit
